00022 template <class Base>
00023 class TLoggerCompWrap: public ibase::TLoggerWrap<Base>
00024 {
00025 public:
00026        typedef ibase::TLoggerWrap<Base> BaseClass;
00027 
00028        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TLoggerCompWrap);
00029               I_ASSIGN(m_logCompPtr, "Log", "Consumer log messages", false, "Log");
00030        I_END_COMPONENT
00031        
00032 protected:
00033        // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00034        virtual void DecorateMessage(
00035                             istd::ILogger::MessageCategory category,
00036                             int id,
00037                             int flags,
00038                             istd::CString& message,
00039                             istd::CString& messageSource) const;
00040 
00041        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00042        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00043 
00044 private:
00045        I_REF(ibase::IMessageConsumer, m_logCompPtr);
00046 };

00049 // protected methods

00051 // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00052 
00053 template <class Base>
00054 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::DecorateMessage(
00055                      istd::ILogger::MessageCategory category,
00056                      int id,
00057                      int flags,
00058                      istd::CString& message,
00059                      istd::CString& messageSource) const
00060 {
00061        BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, message, messageSource);
00062 
00063        const icomp::CComponentContext* contextPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::CComponentContext*>(BaseClass::GetComponentContext());
00064        if (contextPtr != NULL){
00065               if (messageSource.empty()){
00066                      messageSource = contextPtr->GetContextId();
00067               }
00068               else{
00069                      messageSource = istd::CString(contextPtr->GetContextId()) + " (" + messageSource + ")";
00070               }
00071        }
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00076 
00077 template <class Base>
00078 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::OnComponentCreated()
00079 {
00080        if (m_logCompPtr.IsValid()){
00081               this->SetLogPtr(m_logCompPtr.GetPtr());
00082        }
00083 
00084        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00085 }
